caption: Sunlight pours through a window into the interior of a building. A man stands in this partly ruined structure as the sun rises from the horizon. Palm trees surround the area. The man approaches a telescope and observes the moon. Then, the video transitions to celestial scenes, showing stars, nebulae, a massive blue star, and the Milky Way, along with Earth. The man remains at the telescope, continuously explaining. Afterward, he proceeds to walk along the rocky terrain at the mountainside. Next, a fighter jet and appears. There is also a person who is pulling the zip wearing green clothes.

breakpoint.answer: At the surface of a gigantic star.
